treatment.description: Perennials, 90–150 cm. Leaf blades ovate, 6–15(–20+) × 2–10+ cm. Peduncles 1–5(–10) cm. Calyculi of 3–8+ linear bractlets 5–8 mm. Phyllaries 5, oblong, 8–12 mm. Ray laminae 10–18 mm. Disc corollas 7–8 mm. Cypselae 7–8 mm. 2n = 26.
treatment.discussion: Coreopsis latifolia is in the Center for Plant Conservation’s National Collection of Endangered Plants.
